verses.verse: <WG2532> After<WG3326> these things<WG5023> I heard<WG191> something like a loud<WG3173> voice<WG5456> of a great<WG3173> multitude<WG3793> in<WG1722> heaven,<WG3772> saying,<WG3004> "Hallelujah!<WG239> Salvation,<WG4991> <WG2532> power,<WG1411> and<WG2532> glory<WG1391> <WG2532><WG99999> belong to<WG2962> our<WG2257> God:<WG2316>

for<WG3754> true<WG228> and<WG2532> righteous<WG1342> are his<WG846> judgments.<WG2920> For<WG3754> he has judged<WG2919> the great<WG3173> prostitute,<WG4204> who<WG3748> corrupted<WG5351> the earth<WG1093> with<WG1722> her<WG846> sexual immorality,<WG4202> and<WG2532> he has avenged<WG1556> the blood<WG129> of his<WG846> servants<WG1401> at<WG1537> her<WG846> hand.<WG5495>"
<WG2532> A second<WG1208> said,<WG2046> "Hallelujah!<WG239> <WG2532> Her<WG846> smoke<WG2586> goes up<WG305> <WG1519> forever<WG165> and ever.<WG165>"

<WG2532> The twenty<WG1501> - four<WG5064> elders<WG4245> and<WG2532> the four<WG5064> living creatures<WG2226> fell down<WG4098> and<WG2532> worshiped<WG4352> God<WG2316> who sits<WG2521> on<WG1909> the throne,<WG2362> saying,<WG3004> "Amen!<WG281> Hallelujah!<WG239>"

<WG2532> A voice<WG5456> came forth<WG1831> from<WG1537> the throne,<WG2362> saying,<WG3004> "Give praise<WG134> to our<WG2257> God,<WG2316> all<WG3956> you his<WG846> servants,<WG1401> <WG2532> you who<WG3588> fear<WG5399> him,<WG846> the<WG2532> small<WG3398> and<WG2532> the great!<WG3173>"

<WG2532> I heard<WG191> something like<WG5613> the voice<WG5456> of a great<WG4183> multitude,<WG3793> and<WG2532> like<WG5613> the voice<WG5456> of many<WG4183> waters,<WG5204> and<WG2532> like<WG5613> the voice<WG5456> of mighty<WG2478> thunders,<WG1027> saying,<WG3004> "Hallelujah!<WG239> For<WG3754> the Lord<WG2962> our God,<WG2316> the Almighty,<WG3841> reigns!<WG936>

Let us rejoice<WG21> and<WG2532> be exceedingly glad,<WG5463> and<WG2532> let us give<WG1325> the glory<WG1391> to him.<WG846> For<WG3754> the marriage<WG1062> of the Lamb<WG721> has come,<WG2064> and<WG2532> his<WG846> wife<WG1135> has made<WG2090> herself<WG1438> ready.<WG2090>"

<WG2532> It was given<WG1325> to her<WG846> that<WG2443> she would array<WG4016> herself in bright,<WG2986> <WG2532> pure,<WG2513> fine linen:<WG1039> for<WG1063> the fine linen<WG1039> is<WG2076> the righteous<WG1345> acts of the saints.<WG40>

<WG2532> He said<WG3004> to me,<WG3427> "Write,<WG1125> <WG3107> 'Blessed are those who<WG3588> are invited<WG2564> to<WG1519> the marriage<WG1062> supper<WG1173> of the Lamb.<WG721>'" <WG2532> He said<WG3004> to me,<WG3427> "These<WG3778> are<WG1526> true<WG228> words<WG3056> of God.<WG2316>"

<WG2532> I fell<WG4098> down before<WG1715> his<WG846> feet<WG4228> to worship<WG4352> him.<WG846> <WG2532> He said<WG3004> to me,<WG3427> "Look!<WG3708> Don't<WG3361> do it!<WG1510> I am a fellow bondservant<WG4889> with you<WG4675> and<WG2532> with your<WG4675> brothers<WG80> who hold<WG2192> the testimony<WG3141> of Jesus.<WG2424> Worship<WG4352> God,<WG2316> for<WG1063> the testimony<WG3141> of Jesus<WG2424> is<WG2076> the Spirit<WG4151> of Prophecy.<WG4394>"

<WG2532> I saw<WG1492> the heaven<WG3772> opened,<WG455> and<WG2532> behold,<WG2400> a white<WG3022> horse,<WG2462> and<WG2532> he who sat<WG2521> on<WG1909> it<WG846> is called<WG2564> Faithful<WG4103> and<WG2532> True.<WG228> <WG2532> In<WG1722> righteousness<WG1343> he judges<WG2919> and<WG2532> makes war.<WG4170>

<WG1161> His<WG846> eyes<WG3788> are<WG5613> a flame<WG5395> of fire,<WG4442> and<WG2532> on<WG1909> his<WG846> head<WG2776> are many<WG4183> crowns.<WG1238> He has<WG3686> names written and a name<WG3686> written<WG1125> which<WG3739> no one<WG3762> knows<WG1492> but<WG1508> he himself.<WG846>
<WG2532> He<WG4016> is clothed<WG4016> in a garment<WG2440> sprinkled<WG911> with blood.<WG129> <WG2532> His<WG846> name<WG3686> is called<WG2564> "The Word<WG3056> of God.<WG2316>"

<WG2532> The armies<WG4753> which are in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772> followed<WG190> him<WG846> on<WG1909> white<WG3022> horses,<WG2462> clothed in<WG1746> white,<WG3022> <WG2532> pure,<WG2513> fine linen.<WG1039>

<WG2532> Out of<WG1537> his<WG846> mouth<WG4750> proceeds<WG1607> a sharp,<WG3691> double-edged<WG4501> sword, that<WG2443> with<WG1722> it<WG846> he<WG846> should strike<WG3960> the nations.<WG1484> <WG2532> He<WG846> will rule<WG4165> them<WG846> with<WG1722> an iron<WG4603> rod.<WG4464> He<WG846> treads<WG3961> the winepress<WG3025> <WG3631> of the fierceness<WG2372> of<WG2532> the wrath<WG3709> of God,<WG2316> the Almighty.<WG3841>

<WG2532> He has<WG2192> on<WG1909> his garment<WG2440> and<WG2532> on<WG1909> his<WG846> thigh<WG3382> a name written,<WG1125> "KING<WG935> OF KINGS,<WG935> AND<WG2532> LORD<WG2962> OF LORDS.<WG2962>"

<WG2532> I saw<WG1492> an<WG1520> angel<WG32> standing<WG2476> in<WG1722> the sun.<WG2246> <WG2532> He cried<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> saying<WG3004> to all<WG3956> the birds<WG3732> that fly<WG4072> in<WG1722> the sky,<WG3321> "Come!<WG1205> <WG2532> Be gathered together<WG4863> to<WG1519> the great<WG3173> supper<WG1173> of God,<WG2316>

that<WG2443> you may eat<WG5315> the flesh<WG4561> of kings,<WG935> <WG2532> the flesh<WG4561> of captains,<WG5506> <WG2532> the flesh<WG4561> of mighty men,<WG2478> and<WG2532> the flesh<WG4561> of horses<WG2462> and<WG2532> of those who sit<WG2521> on<WG1909> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> the flesh<WG4561> of all<WG3956> men,<WG1658> both free and<WG2532> slave,<WG1401> and<WG2532> small<WG3398> and<WG2532> great.<WG3173>"

<WG2532> I saw<WG1492> the beast,<WG2342> and<WG2532> the kings<WG935> of the earth,<WG1093> and<WG2532> their<WG846> armies,<WG4753> gathered together<WG4863> to make<WG4160> war<WG4171> against<WG3326> him<WG3588> who sat<WG2521> on<WG1909> the horse,<WG2462> and<WG2532> against<WG3326> his<WG846> army.<WG4753>

<WG2532> The beast<WG2342> was taken,<WG4084> and<WG2532> with<WG3326> him<WG5127> the false prophet<WG5578> who worked<WG4160> the signs<WG4592> in his<WG846> sight,<WG1799> with<WG1722> which<WG3739> he deceived<WG4105> those who had received<WG2983> the mark<WG5480> of the beast<WG2342> and<WG2532> those who worshiped<WG4352> his<WG846> image.<WG1504> These two<WG1417> were thrown<WG906> alive<WG2198> into<WG1519> the lake<WG3041> of fire<WG4442> that burns<WG2545> with<WG1722> sulfur.<WG2303>

<WG2532> The rest<WG3062> were killed<WG615> with<WG1722> the sword<WG4501> of him<WG3588> who sat<WG2521> on<WG1909> the horse,<WG2462> the sword which<WG3588> came forth<WG1607> out of<WG1537> his<WG846> mouth.<WG4750> <WG2532> All<WG3956> the birds<WG3732> were filled<WG5526> with<WG1537> their<WG846> flesh.<WG4561>
